com.jpower.simplemail.event

Class MailEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jpower.simplemail.event.AbstractEvent<SMail>
      • com.jpower.simplemail.event.MailEvent

  • public class MailEvent
extends AbstractEvent<SMail>

    Evento gerado por SMail para conexão, envio e recebimento de emails.

    See Also:
    SMail
